import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Flex, Spacer, Heading, Progress, Stack, ButtonGroup, Button, VStack, Table, Thead, Tbody, Tfoot, Tr, Th, Td, TableCaption, } from "@chakra-ui/react" import Menu from './Menu' import { BiPlay, BiPause, BiStop, BiTrash, BiPlus } from "react-icons/bi" function Dashboard() { const [state, setState] = useState({}) const getData = async () => { const response = await fetch("http://localhost:5000/status") const data = await response.json() setState(data) console.log(data) } return ( <> STATISTICS TORRENT NAME HERE { state[0].map(x => (

{x["name"]}

{x["speed"]}

{x["progress"]}

{x["eta"]}

{x["uplo"]}

{x["seeds"]}

)) } TASK MANAGER
NAME PROGRESS STATUS
XYZ ABC 0.91444
) } export default Dashboard
